string.value: I have to drive through this base to achieve my goal. That looks dangerous.
I feel as if I know this truck. This symbol, I've seen it somewhere before...
That's Ivan Go's car, my dad's car! I'll have to take a closer look.
His body is not inside, so he went further on foot.
He's very close - but why am I afraid of what lies ahead?
Oh gods! What is this cursed place?
Who are all these people?
Now I get it...
What draws these people here? What if I can still save them?
Done. This thing seems to be working...
I hope I made the right choice. Now that the world is safe, it's time to pay Ben a visit and see how Lisa is doing.
Damn, there are so many bandits here! And more and more!
SERGO|STOP FIRING!!!
Sergo?! You?!
SERGO|I understand that you have a lot to ask me. And I have a lot to tell you. Follow me, and we'll talk in more quiet space.
I feel the power beckoning me to the Overlord.
Faster! How slowly this vehicle moves! Argh, hell with it!
I can't stop, but it's getting harder and harder for me to walk...
Goddamn it... I... can... n-o-t... m...o...v...e... Argh...
SERGO|Do you think he understood?
I don't think so. He's not ready yet. For now, he sincerely believes that he can save everyone.
SERGO|So what do we do next?
Nothing. We've already done everything we can. The rest is up to him.
Do you wish to leave this area?
Do you wish to teleport directly to Ridzin?
You came too close to the Overlord and were consumed by its power, as were many before you. And who knows how long people will have to wait for a new hero...
